welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Leonia, a charming city known for its rich history, delicious cuisine, and friendly locals. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: This terminal primarily serves domestic flights for American Airlines and Delta Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: This terminal serves both domestic and international flights for various airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic flights for JetBlue Airways.

wifi.note: Passengers can access the free WiFi for up to 30 minutes per day.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Caldwell Wright Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is dedicated to private and charter flights, offering a more exclusive and personalized experience.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport for all passengers.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The oldest terminal at Newark Liberty International Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: The newest terminal at Newark Liberty International Airport, serving mainly domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: The main terminal at Newark Liberty International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Available throughout the airport, no password required.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: International flights

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Domestic flights

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: Main terminal for international and domestic flights

terminals.name: Terminal 5
terminals.description: Domestic flights, mainly JetBlue

terminals.name: Terminal 7
terminals.description: International flights, mainly British Airways

terminals.name: Terminal 8
terminals.description: Domestic and international flights, mainly American Airlines

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Westchester County Apt Airport handles all commercial flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Westchester County Apt Airport handles all private and corporate flights.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Linden Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Linden Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Municipal Airport is a modern and efficient facility, offering a variety of amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: The North Terminal at Municipal Airport is primarily used for private and charter flights, with a separate entrance and parking area.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport terminal and concourse areas.
